title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8200 - Railroad Ceilings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8200 - Railroad Ceilings

State Regulations

Subpart 8200-1 - General Provisions (§ 8200-1.1)

Subpart 8200-2 - Reports (§ 8200-2.1 to 8200-2.2)

Subpart 8200-3 - Increased Depreciation (§ 8200-3.1 to 8200-3.3)

Subpart 8200-6 - Determination Of Railroad Ceilings (§ 8200-6.1 to 8200-6.6)

Subpart 8200-7 - Annual Charge To Railroad Companies (§ 8200-7.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8200

Statutory authority: Real Property Tax Law, §§ 202[1][k], [l], 489, 504, 1570, art. 4, titles 2-A and 2-B; State Finance Law, § 97-j
j

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
